title: Logitech Select iPad Cases & Keyboards - From
description: Change the way you interact and type with your iPad when you protect it using the slim Logitech Type+ Protective Case in a professional black. Designed specifically for the iPad Air, this case protects all sides of your tablet from accidental bumps, scratches, and spills. This case enables you to prop up your iPad Air for the optimal viewing angle, and resists bouncing or tipping when in use. Connect via Bluetooth to the comfortable keyboard and use the iOS shortcut buttons to easily navigate your screen.

title: Nexxtech 10cm Flexible USB To Lightning Cable -
description: Nexxtech makes it easy to keep your Lightning cable equipped devices charged and at the ready with the flexible USB to Lightning charge & sync cable. The flexible & portable cable is 10cm in length allowing you to charge your iPhone or iPad easily. They are available in 4 fun colours, so you can colour coordinate with your favorite device.

title: Select iPad Smart Covers - From
description: Protect your iPad with the sleek single piece design of the Smart Cover that also wakes your iPad when opened and puts it to sleep when closed. The lightweight, durable Smart cover protects your screen without covering up the aluminum back, so that your iPad still looks and feels like an iPad. The magnetic connection of the hinge aligns the smart Cover with your iPad for the perfect fit. It also does double duty as a keyboard stand allowing you to put your iPad into a comfortable writing position.

title: Belkin Slim Style iPad Air 1 & 2 Folio Case -
description: Cleverly constructed to eliminate unnecessary bulk from the case's overall profile, the Belkin Slim Style Cover for the iPad Air is the perfect case. It features a sleek, thin construction that's incredibility durable, and a versatile design for all the ways to use your iPad.

title: Bose SoundTrue II Over Ear Headphones w/Mic -
description: Plug into deep, true-to-life sound with Bose SoundTrue around-ear headphones II. The slim and lightweight design makes them comfortable to wear for hours on end, and the suite of proprietary Bose technologies ensures a crisp, clear, top-end sound. The in-line mic with remote is compatible with select iPhone, iPad, and iPod models.

title: Logitech iPad Mini Turn-Rotating Folio Case -
description: Go from portrait to landscape and back again easily based on whatever your game, app or video needs. The Logitech Turnaround Rotating Case for iPad Mini transforms into a clutch that protects iPad on the go.

title: Logitech Turnaround iPad Air 2 Folio Case -
description: Shield your iPad Air 2 from bumps and dings with the Logitech Turnaround folio case. It conveniently transforms into a clutch for ease of carrying and offers a rotating frame so you can smoothly switch your view from landscape to portrait. Prop up your device with the multi-angle stand for better viewing while typing or movie watching.

title: PKG SLIP 10" iPad/Tablet Sleeve -
description: Looking for a smart and simple way to protect your device while you're on the go? Look no further than the handy SLIP Sleeve from PKG. Designed to fit an iPad or tablet up to 10", this case sports durable outer fabrics and high-density foam to safeguard your device from life's bumps and bruises while you're on the move.
